textBox.richText: My poor cats are gravely ill, and I am studying for the GRE in a couple weeks, so there won’t be many entries this month. I have updated and added a lot of resources to the Links for Curriculum page and finished formatting the links on the Teaching page. When I get a chance, the pages I will be updating and adding to, hopefully to be finished before July, are the following: Links for Websites by Teachers Links for Presentations & Lectures Links for Outlines, Notes & Timelines Links for University Professor & Course Sites Links for University World History & Genocide Studies Departments Please let me know what thoughts you have on content and format. I would really appreciate it.
